google_play_reviews.content: The last version was awesome... I really don't like it, it's any possibility to keep the old version? The way this new one works don't let me calculate the work hours including the break and without it it's difficult because of the difference between minutes.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review. I apologize for the inconvenience caused. I will add this back in the next update. Periodically check back for updates. Please update your review when you receive the update.
